Jumpstart your clinic’s efficiency

Our intake platform and built-in workflow automations are optimized specifically for urgent care clinics.

Bring the next generation of EMRs
to your Urgent Care practice

  • Intuitive interface

    Designed to fit with the natural progression of decision making.

  • Workflow automations

    Predicts treatment plans, prescriptions, billing codes and more.

  • Telehealth Ecosystem

    Seamless experience built into the EMR and patient application.

Streamlined Practice Management

  • Efficient Scheduling & Intake Platform

    Allows patients to self register online or on the patient app to expedite the intake process.

  • Simple Follow-up

    Easily communicate results and documents with patients using the patient portal.

  • Office Tasks Made Easy.

    In-office messaging, and intuitive task management system to increase practice efficiency.

Automated RCM and Analytics With
KPIs At your fingertips.

  • IPredictive Coding Engine

    Precisely predicts CPT codes to enhance billing accuracy and efficiency.

  • Efficient Medical Billing

    One click and done. We handle the rest. Track status of claims, analyze payor mixture, and examine coding distribution.

  • Operational Metrics

    Monitor clinic performance, practice trends, and identify areas of growth.

Empower patients with our patient app

  • Patient intake and Payments

    Streamlined intake & payment experience for patients.

  • Medical Wallet

    Patients can track their health and access their medical record.
